location: Studio 4 Athletics 715 Yates Street Victoria, BC V8W 1L6
description: Join us for Caliente Salsa Saturdays! Doors open at 8:15pm. Beginner Salsa Lesson at 8:30pm. Dancing for all levels to Salsa, Bachata, Merengue & Cha Cha Cha from 9:00pm to midnight. Ages 16+ welcome. CASH ONLY AT THE DOOR. Limited capacity. First come first served.
